mapper.update: update cart set menu_cnt=#{menuCnt} where cart_seqno=#{cartSeqno}
mapper.select: select a.cart_seqno, a.m_id, a.m_se, a.menu_cnt,a.s_se, b.menu_name, b.menu_price, b.menu_cal from cart a left outer join menu b on a.m_se=b.menu_seqno where m_id=#{mId}
select * from cart where m_id=#{mId} and m_se=#{mSe}
select count(*) cnt from cart where m_id=#{mId} and s_se=#{sSe}
select s_address from store where s_seqno = #{param1}
select m_address from member where m_id = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into o_detailed (o_se,o_name,o_qty,qty_price) select o_seqno.currval num,menu_name,menu_cnt,(menu_cnt*menu_price) qty_price from cart a, menu b where a.m_se=b.menu_seqno and m_id=#{param1}
insert into o_detailed values (o_seqno.currval,'배달팁',1, (select o_price from orderend where o_seqno=#{param1})- (select sum(qty_price) from o_detailed a where a.o_se = #{param1}))
mapper.select: select a.o_seqno,a.m_id m_id,a.s_se,a.o_price,a.o_date,a.o_name,a.o_status,a.cnt_review,b.s_name from orderend a,store b where a.s_se = b.s_seqno and a.m_id=#{parma1}
mapper.update: update orderend set cnt_review=1 where o_seqno=#{param1}
update orderend set cnt_review = cnt_review-1 where o_seqno=(select o_se from review where r_seqno = #{param1})
